thread.title: 18 people who have no idea how to use a computer
thread.title_full: 18 people who have no idea how to use a computer

author: Brian Koerber
title: 18 people who have no idea how to use a computer
text:
18 people who have no idea how to use a computer 0 2017-02-22 21:12:30 UTC 
Just because you own a fancy laptop doesn't mean you're very tech savvy. 
From horrifying computer deaths to disgusting motherboards covered in a mysterious mold, Reddit's IT professionals at r/ TechSupportGore share some of the gnarliest tech nightmares that roll into their shops. 
Check it out, and if you aren't very tech friendly, take this as an opportunity to learn from some other people's mistakes. 1. No room? No problem.
